item.title: New Blog!
item.description: I nuked the my old blog to allow this one to be more focused on my endeavors in IoT and hardware hacking with some web/mobile stuff tossed in here and there. Iâ€™m especially interested in fault injection and side-channel analysis and will be posting about these topics in the near future.
